lion-bare-hands.english: He tore the lion apart as one would tear a young goat

jawbone-thousand.context: Samson's battle cry after slaying Philistines
jawbone-thousand.hebrew: בִּלְחִי הַחֲמוֹר חֲמוֹר חֲמֹרָתָיִם בִּלְחִי הַחֲמוֹר הִכֵּיתִי אֶלֶף אִישׁ
jawbone-thousand.english: With the jawbone of a donkey I have slain a thousand men

strength-in-hair.context: Samson reveals his secret to Delilah
strength-in-hair.english: If my head is shaved, my strength will leave me

grinding-in-prison.english: He was grinding grain in the prison

one-more-time.hebrew: זָכְרֵנִי נָא וְחַזְּקֵנִי נָא אַךְ הַפַּעַם הַזֶּה
one-more-time.english: Remember me and strengthen me only this once

die-with-philistines.english: Let me die with the Philistines

gates-of-gaza.english: He pulled them up, bar and all
